title: National Parks of New York Harbor: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved         Centennial Volunteer Ambassador Kahmia Moise welcomes attendees of a local festival to Find Your Park. NPS PHOTO  There is no better time to get involved with parks As the National Park Service celebrates its Centennial in 2016, there are more ways to get involved with the National Parks of New York Harbor than ever. Volunteers accomplish so much, including helping build trails, staffing programs, taking stunning photographs of park resources and keeping beaches clean. Partner organizations raise awareness of what our parks have to offer. Planning requires community and park communication and collaboration. There are so many ways to work with us and support your parks!
